titleStmt.title: The protestation and declaration of divers knights, esquires, gentlemen, and free-holders of the counties of Lincolne and Nottingham: against the unjust oppressions and inhumane proceedings of William Earle of New-castle and his cavaleers: wherein they doe declare themselves enemies to all such violent courses, and protest to hazzard their lives and estates in defense of His Majesty, the Common-wealth, and the high court of Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: The true copy, sent to be printed at London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
